column2:
configure  terminal
  banner motd #[message]#
  hostname [name]
  username [name] privilege {0-15} algorithm [type] secret [password]
  enable algorithm [type] secret [password]
  service password-encryption
  ip domain-name [name]
  no ip domain-lookup

configure terminal
  line console 0
    logging sync
    login local
    exec-timeout [minutes] [seconds]

configure terminal
  line vty [first number] [last number]
    logging sync
    login local
    exec-timeout [minutes] [seconds]
    transport input none
    transport output none

configure terminal
  line aux 0
    no login
    no exec
    transport input none
    transport output none

configure terminal
  interface [interface]
    description [opposing device or usage]
    no shutdown

configure terminal
  interface range [range]
    description NOT_USED
    shutdown

! It is debatable whether static or auto is best practice for link
! auto is the default

configure terminal
  interface range [range]
  speed [highest link speed]
  duplex {half | full}

! It is debatable whether static or auto is best practice for link configuration
! auto is the default

configure terminal
  interface range [range]
  no negotiation auto
  speed [highest link speed]
  duplex {half | full}

configure terminal
  clock timezone [name] [hours offset] [minutes offset]

column2:

column2:
